segments.text: This scene is just heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mother is so absorbed in her task, oblivious to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out of the sink, ruining everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking so much just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool could fall and really hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is egging him on, so innocent yet dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, and no one sees it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the mom; she'll be devastated when she finds out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a beautiful garden, but inside it's a disaster waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a slow-motion accident unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them somehow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies aren't worth this trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
